modName: UPSO Ultra Perfect Skyrim and Overhaul FR

There are ENB preset but also several categories of mods (click on tags to see what the patch changes), and after your data folder make more of 25GB. All is compatible and stable.

descriptionHtml:
INTRODUCTION: 

IT\'S JUST A MANUAL OF INSTALLATION (FRENCH) to make your Skyrim perfect, with a complete list of MOD that you need to install (more than 250), NOT MORE.

There are ENB preset but also several mods (click on tags to see what the patch changes), and after your data folder make more of 25GB. All is compatible and stable.

Just read the manual on the link or donwload it.

Easy.

UPSO 2.1 coming soon!! Discover the video here:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fG0bGdTWIEE&feature=c4-overview&list=UUnmiEVW1h9uqXj77PLpe2pQ






INSTALLATION:

Le chemin vers la perfection / The way to the perfection...
Suivez les instructions du manuel d\\\'installation / Read the manual of installation
Le manuel d\\\'installation se trouve ici / The manual of installation is here:


Part 1: http://lapassiondumangaselonjinfuushen.over-blog.com/article-obtenir-la-perfection-pour-skyrim-avec-u-p-s-o-premiere-partie-jeux-videos-117095556.html

Part 2: http://lapassiondumangaselonjinfuushen.over-blog.com/article-obtenir-la-perfection-pour-skyrim-avec-u-p-s-o-deuxieme-partie-jeux-videos-117041908.html

Part 3: http://lapassiondumangaselonjinfuushen.over-blog.com/article-obtenir-la-perfection-pour-skyrim-avec-u-p-s-o-troisieme-partie-jeux-videos-117095512.html









PREVIEW LIST OF CHANGES:

ENB
Texture HD 2k and/or 4k for all
New Weapons
New Armors
New shields
New clothing
New Quests
New NPC\'s
New creatures
New homes
New environments
New landscapes
New magic effects
New spells
More immersion with a complete list of mods to make gameplay real
New animation
New sounds
New sky
New skin for males and females
New races/classes component
New guilds and factions
New lighting
New water
New Hair
Performance optimization with several tweaks
New dungeons

and more... so much more.
author: Jinfuushen
